definition: to admit, usually to a wrongdoing
details:
verb
- to admit, usually to a wrongdoing
= example: to admit, usually to a wrongdoing
= synonyms: profess
- to confess to God in the presence of a priest, as in the Catholic faith
- to admit to a punishable or reprehensible deed, usually under pressure
= example: to admit to a punishable or reprehensible deed, usually under pressure
= synonyms: squeal
